manifest.description_for_model: Given an address in the United States and an amount, the system will calculate the sales tax. The system can also provide the sales tax given a city, or both a city and state. The total sales tax is the sum of state, county, city and special jurisdiction sales taxes.
manifest.description_for_human: Calculate sales tax given a U.S. address (or just a city) and an amount. Powered by Avalara.
